contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} '''USS ''Nevada''''' may refer to: *{{USS|Neshaminy|1865}} was renamed ''Nevada'' in August 1869 *{{USS|Nevada|BM-8}}, was a monitor commissioned in 1902, renamed to ''Tonopah'' in 1909, and sold in 1922 *{{USS|Nevada|BB-36}} was a battleship, commissioned in 1916, damaged in the attack on Pearl Harbor, repaired and served during World War II, used as a target for Operation Crossroads after the war in 1946, and finally sunk for practice in 1948 *{{USS|Nevada|SSBN-733}} is an ''Ohio''-class ballistic missile submarine commissioned in 1986 and currently in active service {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Nevada}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]] [[Category:United States Navy Nevada-related ships]]
